metadata.title: CVE-2022-1196 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: After a VR Process is destroyed, a reference to it may have been retainedand used, leading to a use-after-free and potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.8 and Firefox ESR < 91.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
